Class ForumApplicationTests

@SpringBootTest

class ForumApplicationTests
extends java.lang.Object

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    (package private) void shouldAddNewQuestionReturn201()
    Scenario: Given QuestionDTO with author and message object, method addNewQuestion stores object and return 201 CREATED status code
    (package private) void shouldAddNewReplyReturn201()
    Scenario: Given QuestionDTO object containing author and message stored with id = questionId and ReplyDTO object, method addReplyToQuestion stores object and return 201 CREATED status code
    (package private) void shouldContextLoads()
    Scenario: Spring context is up and questionController initiated and not null
    (package private) void shouldGetAllQuestionsReturn200()
    Scenario: without any precondition getAllQuestions returns 200 OK status code
    (package private) void shouldGetThreadReturn200()
    Scenario: Given QuestionDTO object containing author and message stored with id = questionId, method getThread returns 200 OK status code
    void shouldQuestionWithAuthorAndMessageReturn201()
    Scenario: Given JSON body with author and message fields, POST request to API endpoint returns 201 CREATED status code
    void shouldQuestionWithBlankAuthorReturn400()
    Scenario: Given JSON body with message field and author field with empty value, POST request to API endpoint returns 400 BAD REQUEST status code
    void shouldQuestionWithBlankMessageReturn400()
    Scenario: Given JSON body with author field and message field with empty value, POST request to API endpoint returns 400 BAD REQUEST status code
    void shouldQuestionWithMissingAuthorReturn400()
    Scenario: Given JSON body with message field only, POST request to API endpoint returns 400 BAD REQUEST status code
    void shouldQuestionWithMissingMessageReturn400()
    Scenario: Given JSON body with author field only, POST request to API endpoint returns 400 BAD REQUEST status code
    void shouldReturn400forExistingQuestionWhileAddingReplyWithEmptyAuthor()
    Scenario: Given JSON body with empty-valued author field only and existing questionId, POST request to addReplyToQuestion URL returns 400 BAD REQUEST status code
    void shouldReturn400forExistingQuestionWhileAddingReplyWithEmptyMessage()
    Scenario: Given JSON body with empty-valued and existing questionId, POST request to addReplyToQuestion URL returns 400 BAD REQUEST status code
    void shouldReturn400forExistingQuestionWhileAddingReplyWithMissingAuthor()
    Scenario: Given JSON body with missing author field and existing questionId, POST request to addReplyToQuestion URL returns 400 BAD REQUEST status code
    void shouldReturn400forExistingQuestionWhileAddingReplyWithMissingMessage()
    Scenario: Given JSON body with missing message field and existing questionId, POST request to addReplyToQuestion URL returns 400 BAD REQUEST status code
    void shouldReturn404AddingReplyWithWrongUrl()
    Scenario: Given JSON body with author and message fields and non existing questionId, POST request to addReplyToQuestion URL returns 404 NOT FOUND status code
    void shouldReturn404forNonExistingQuestion()
    Scenario: Given non existing questionId = 9999 and getThread method context path as URL, GET request to URL returns 404 NOT FOUND status code
    void shouldReturn404forNonExistingQuestionWhileAddingReply()
    Scenario: Given JSON body with author and message fields and non existing questionId, POST request to addReplyToQuestion URL returns 404 NOT FOUND status code
